Posts.Content: Â My girlfriend was just dionosed for breast cancer, but when she went in for the biopsie the doctor wanted to start her on ceamo. He had already had it set up she gets the biopse done and again was contacted by another place for ceamo she went to get her results and the doctor couldn`t even tell her what stage she is in and again pushing the ceamo. is this right? my girlfreind has been freaked out for weeks now, what do i do?
Posts.Title: need to know what to do
